snippet.title: Arrests made as the US triples investigations into 'culture of leaks'
snippet.content:
Washington: US Attorney General Jeff Sessions said on Friday the Justice Department had tripled the number of investigations into unauthorised leaks of classified information and that four people had been charged. "We are taking a stand," Mr Sessions told reporters as he announced the administration's efforts to battle what he called "the staggering number of leaks undermining the ability of our government to protect this country."
